We dropped two points should never have, an angry Rudan, whose mood had not been improved after watching his star striker Alessandro Diamanti also hit the woodwork twice in the closing minutes.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Melbourne Demons beat Gold Coast Suns despite late AFLW schedule change - ABC News
articles.description: They are no longer co-captains, but Erin Phillips and Chelsea Randall still led from the front in Adelaide's first game of the AFLW season — a 38-point thumping of West Coast.
articles.content:
Adelaide will be desperate to keep Erin Phillips and Chelsea Randall on the park in 2021 after they dominated West Coast in the Crows' 38-point drubbing of West Coast.
